Title: Ingest Equities via yfinance
Description: Build pipeline for SPY, QQQ, GLD daily/hourly data (2000-2024). Apply auto-adjustment for splits/dividends. ACCEPTANCE: Data covers all 3 regime periods; Adjusted close prices verified; No gaps > 1 day; Hash-stamped output.

Title: Ingest Crypto via CoinAPI
Description: Acquire BTC-USD and ETH-USD 1-minute flat files for the 2017 window. Implement gap-filling logic for exchange downtime using forward-fill. ACCEPTANCE: 1-minute granularity achieved; Gaps < 5min documented; Hash-stamped output.

Title: Ingest Macro via FRED API
Description: Connect to FRED API. Fetch VIXCLS (VIX), DFF (Fed Funds Rate), TED Spread, 2Y/10Y Treasury yields. Align timestamps to UTC. ACCEPTANCE: All 4 macro series ingested; UTC alignment verified; Hash-stamped output.

Title: Code Volatility Estimator
Description: Implement EWM standard deviation of returns with span=20 parameter. Formula: σ_t = EWM(std(returns)). ACCEPTANCE: Unit tests pass; Output matches reference implementation; Configurable span parameter.

Title: Code Triple-Barrier Labeler
Description: Implement Triple-Barrier Method with parameters: M=2 (barrier width in σ), T=10 (vertical barrier days). Labels: 1 (bullish), -1 (bearish), 0 (neutral). ACCEPTANCE: Path-dependency verified; Volatility-adjusted barriers; Hash-stamped config and output.

Title: Build Reproducibility System
Description: Implement SHA-256 hash generation for: (1) Source input CSV, (2) Config parameters JSON, (3) Labeled output. Store hashes in manifest file. ACCEPTANCE: Hash verification script works; Manifest auto-generated; Evidence locker integration.

Title: Implement PELT Regime Detector
Description: Build TCPD anomaly detection using ruptures library. Algorithm: PELT with RBF cost function. Detects volatility regime changes. ACCEPTANCE: Regimes segmented for all 3 periods (GFC, Crypto, Covid); Penalty parameter tunable.

Title: Build Tier 1 Naive Baselines
Description: Implement Random Walk (P_t+1 = P_t) and Buy-and-Hold strategies. Calculate returns for all 3 regime datasets. ACCEPTANCE: Reproducible runs; Fixed seeds; Sharpe ratio calculated.

Title: Build Tier 2 Technical Baselines
Description: Implement SMA 50/200 crossover and Bollinger Band mean reversion strategies. ACCEPTANCE: Entry/exit signals generated; Transaction costs applied; Performance vs Buy-Hold documented.

Title: Build Tier 3 ARIMA Baseline
Description: Implement ARIMA model for price forecasting. Tune p,d,q parameters. Compare against naive baselines. ACCEPTANCE: Model trained on each regime; AIC/BIC documented; Diebold-Mariano test prepared.

Title: Train LSTM Baseline Model
Description: Implement LSTM architecture for time series prediction on Triple-Barrier labeled data. ACCEPTANCE: Model converges; Validation loss stable; IC > 0.05 on holdout set.

Title: Compute Metric Matrix
Description: Calculate full metric suite: DA, IC, RankIC (signal quality); Sharpe, Sortino, Max Drawdown (risk-adjusted); Precision, Recall, F1, MTTD (reversal). ACCEPTANCE: All metrics computed for all models; League Table generated.

Title: Run Diebold-Mariano Tests
Description: Execute DM statistical tests comparing S-DNA vs Tier 3 baselines. Threshold: p-value < 0.05 for claimed superiority. ACCEPTANCE: Statistical significance documented; Results in evidence locker.

Title: Generate League Table Report
Description: Create visualization comparing all models across all metrics. Include: ranking, confidence intervals, regime-specific performance. ACCEPTANCE: PDF/PNG artifacts generated; Hash-stamped; Linear issue attachment.
